snippet: The Delta State University instructor accused of killing his girlfriend and a colleague killed himself as the police closed in on him during a manhunt.
abstract: Delta State University instructor Shannon Lamb commits suicide as police close in on him during manhunt; had been accused of fatally shooting girlfriend Amy Prentiss and colleague Ethan Schmidt.
lead_paragraph: The Delta State University instructor accused of killing his girlfriend and a colleague killed himself as the police closed in on him during a manhunt.

headline.main: Mississippi: Teacher Wanted in 2 Slayings Kills Himself
headline.print_headline: Mississippi: Teacher Wanted in Two Slayings Kills Himself
